rotationAngle.description: Describes geometrical rotation of the pattern relative to its top left corner. Positive angles are clockwise. Measured in degrees.

leftOffset.description: Left offset of the top left corner relative to the canvas. Measured in m in Metric system or in ft in USCS

topOffset.description: Top offset of the top left corner relative to the canvas. Measured in m in Metric system or in ft in USCS
